channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boeing to lay off 10% of employees, warns of quarterly loss and lower sales
Dow, S&P 500 close at record highs as stock investors cheer bank earnings
Chinese finance minister hints at increasing the deficit at highly anticipated briefing
item.description: Lan Fo'an emphasized that the space for a deficit increase is "rather large," but noted such policies are still under discussion.

item.title: Trump and Harris spending plans could be dashed by another ‘great bond massacre'
China threatens Taiwan with more trade measures after denouncing president's speech
item.description: China is studying further trade measures against Taiwan, the Ministry of Commerce said on Saturday.

item.title: Trump’s new campaign pledge on autonomous EVs is good for Musk and Waymo, bad for China
item.description: Trump said on the campaign trail that he would ban Chinese-made autonomous vehicles if reelected to the White House this November.

item.title: France’s president doesn’t want to lose ‘Emily in Paris’ to Rome—’We will fight hard’
item.description: Rome’s mayor shot back at Macron, telling him to focus on more pressing issues.

item.title: Boeing to cut 17,000 jobs as losses deepen during factory strike
item.description: Boeing said it will lay off about 10% of its workforce as its losses deepen from an ongoing factory strike.

item.title: Here’s how stocks have performed under Biden-Harris vs. under Trump
Prosecutors seek years in prison for Trump Media insider trading Shvartsman brothers
item.description: Three men convicted of insider trading related to a company's planned merger with Trump Media are awaiting sentences in New York federal court.

item.title: China's car sales snap five-month decline on subsidy boost
item.description: China's passenger vehicle sales rose in September from a year earlier, snapping five months of decline with a boost from a government subsidy.

item.title: Hurricanes Helene, Milton walloped parts of the U.S. What will they do to GDP?
Donald Trump is promising to bring back the America dream—but no one can agree on what it even is anymore
item.description: One thing's for sure: it's not about white picket fences anymore.

item.title: Good parenting boils down to just 4 strategies, according to experts
item.description: Here are some solid ways to lead with love while setting limits, according to experts.

item.title: The creator of ‘Moore’s Law’ said it couldn’t continue forever—and would be astounded by the chips Intel and its competitors are making now
item.description: The creator of Moore's Law acknowledged it couldn't 'continue forever'—but underestimated how human ingenuity keeps powering advances
